packs.title: Agentic AI Master Notebook
packs.description: Complete production-ready reference and bootstrap tool for building agentic AI systems. Includes OpenAI Agents SDK, CrewAI, MCP servers, LangGraph, and deployment templates.

packs.title: CSV → Insight Report Generator
packs.description: Generate comprehensive insight reports from CSV data with statistical analysis, visualizations, and recommendations

packs.title: Prompt Evaluation Harness
packs.description: Evaluate and score prompts with drift detection and performance metrics

packs.title: Competitor Table Builder
packs.description: Build competitor comparison tables with optional web scraping (offline fallback)

packs.title: Stripe Export Cleaner
packs.description: Clean and transform Stripe export CSVs for analysis (no API required)

packs.title: RAG Chunking & Embedding Prep
packs.description: Prepare documents for RAG: chunking, embedding generation, and vector store preparation
